text: niyata vasayenma firavn bhumiyehi itamat unangu vi ehi siti aya vividha kotas valata kheda ovungen ek kotasak khelahina kirima pinisa, ovunge pirimi daruvanva ghatanaya kara, gæhænu daruvanva (pana pitin) jivat vimata ida harimin sitiyeya. ættenma ohu imahat aparadhakarayeku vasayenma sitiyeya
